content: crochet drops basket for christmas nuts in snow and glitter ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **height** approx 7-9 cm \ 2¾ -3½ diameter approx 16-16 cm \ 6¼ -6¼ **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 100-150 g color no 08 red 50 - 50 g color no 01 off-white and use drops glitter from garnstudio 3-3 spools red *yardage does not include glitter as it is a thread * drops crochet hook size 7 mm \ k/10½ or size needed to get approx 15 sts = \* 1 single_crochet 1 chain \* repeat from \*-\* with 1 thread snow and 3 threads glitter = width 10 cm \ 4 height of basket is either 7 or 9 cm \ 2¾ or 3½ diameter is the same for both sizes uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3921&cid=19
